review: Honestly, I would not recommend this product. I understand that it may not have a lot of apps and that you are not able to have that mirror effect off the iPad (I am able to do it through my GalaxyS4) but it works when it wants. All I really wanted it for was for my daughter's room... Netflix and YouTube WAS all I wanted so because all the reviews said that was all that worked I figured that was perfect. Nope, when I'm trying to "find" the device it does not appear all the time. Waste of $30. I have the ROKU box in the other rooms in the house and 1 smart tv... would recommend the other products instead.
author: Garibay M.

review: Chromecast is an amazing device and worth more than the current price tag. It easily outperforms my Fire TV stick, and I love the ability to share the whole screen of my android phone to the TV so I can even play games and watch unsupported video formats.
author: William
